text: Andrew John Hilbert (born February 6, 1981) is an American former professional ice hockey forward who played in the National Hockey League. He was drafted with the 37th overall pick by the Boston Bruins in the 2000 NHL Entry Draft. Hilbert has also played 3 seasons with the Boston Bruins, 1 season with the Chicago Blackhawks, 1 season with the Pittsburgh Penguins and 1 season with the Minnesota Wild. == Other websites == * Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:American ice hockey centers Category:Boston Bruins players Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Houston Aeros (1994â€“2013) players Category:Minnesota Wild players Category:New York Islanders players Category:Pittsburgh Penguins players Category:Providence Bruins players Category:Sportspeople from Michigan Category:United States Hockey League players
title: Andy Hilbert
